name: Survivor Testimonies and Decryption
description: Analyzing witness accounts, deprogramming survivors, and verifying information from ritual abuse survivors.

cards.title: Interpreting Ritual Abuse Survivor Testimonies
cards.description: Deciphering coded language and traumatic memory distortions in victim accounts.
bulletpoints: Identifying key linguistic patterns that indicate ritual abuse.
Decoding hidden messages in fragmented survivor narratives.
Cross-referencing testimonies to identify recurring themes.
cards.summaryText: Teaches how to read coded language, surface hidden cues, and triangulate recurring motifs in survivor accounts.

cards.title: Breaking Dissociative Programming in Witnesses
cards.description: Techniques to assist survivors in recalling suppressed memories and breaking trauma-based mental control.
bulletpoints: Understanding MK-Ultra style conditioning in ritual abuse survivors.
Using trauma-informed methods to unlock suppressed testimonies.
cards.summaryText: Covers recognizing MK-Ultra conditioning, gently retrieving memories, and validating them through comparative analysis.

cards.title: Identifying False Testimonies and PsyOps Manipulation
cards.description: Distinguishing authentic survivor testimonies from controlled opposition and misinformation.
bulletpoints: Analyzing behavioral indicators of deception vs. trauma truth.
Tracking false narrative insertions designed to discredit real survivors.
Investigating controlled leaks used to manipulate public perception.
cards.summaryText: Focuses on separating genuine trauma signals from planted fakes and dissecting psyops that muddy survivor testimony.
